name: Cyber Agent (itch)
description:
!!! FULLSCREEN IS NOT AVAILABLE IN HTML VERSION. I RECOMMEND PLAYING WINDOWS VERSION, BUT IF YOU HAVE TO PLAY IN BROWSER JUST SCALE BROWSER DISPLAY (CTRL + SCROLL) TO ENLARGE GAME WINDOW.

Description

In Cyber Agent, you play the role of an interdimensional secret agent. Your task is to steal sensitive data from government server rooms. You have to be careful - expert spy systems know well from the start that you have invaded their territory. They only need 10 seconds to identify you as the enemy and annihilate. Act fast.

Features

  • 10 Levels with varied mechanics
  • 3 Difficulty settings + practice mode (use it if you feel that the game is too hard SPOILER: it is hard)
  • Challanges changing the approach to the levels
  • Handsome main character (don't let him die!)

How to play

Enjoy!
